fields.name: Anime Box Single Month Subscription
fields.description: A single month subscription to the wonderful 'Anime Box' by Nerd Box. Each month our Anime Box will contain at least five items related to our “Theme of the Month” with a minimum retail value of £50. These can range from posters, plushies, manga and even replica key items from the featured anime. And as your final gift each month you will receive a figurine linked to the month’s theme.

fields.name: Anime Box Three Month Subscription
fields.description: A three-month subscription to the wonderful 'Anime Box' by Nerd Box, saving you 15% per month. fields.name: Movie Box Single Month Subscription

As your final gift each month you will receive a novel adaptation of one of the featured movies or even in some cases the source material itself.
